page.title: 06CLUBS IN THE GROVE CENTRE
page.content:
IN THE GROVE CENTRE LOTS OF CLUBS GO ON FOR ALL AGES.THERE ARE YOUTH CLUBS FOR JUNIORS AND CLUBS WHERE MUMS CAN GO ALONG WITH THEIR TODDLERS.THERE ARE A LOT OF EXERCISE CLASSES AND CLASSES WHERE YOU CAN DO SOME TYPING AND COMPUTING AND HANDICRAFTS AND DRESSMAKING HAVE A CLUB TOO.THERE ARE FRENCH AND GERMAN CLASSES AND THERE ARE ALSO GUITAR AND RECORDER CLUBS. ALL THESE CLUBS GO ON FOR ABOUT 1 1/2 HOURS BUT YOU HAVE TO PAY ABOUT 5 POUNDS FOR 10 OR 20 WEEKS AND MOST OF THEM ARE HELD ONCE A WEEK.MOST OF THESE CLUBS HAVE A CHRISTMAS PARTY.YOUTH CLUB IS 20p TO GET IN,THERE ARE GAMES THERE.
By Helen Falkenau & Lisa Champion
